verses.arabic: قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًا
verses.english: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an.
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "An yi wahayi zuwa gare ni cewa wasu jama'a na aljannu sun saurũri (karatuna), sai suka ce: Lalle ne mũ mun ji wani abin karantãwa (Alƙui'ãni), mai ban mãmãki."

verses.arabic: يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشْدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدًا
verses.english: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone.
verses.hausa: "Yana nũni zuwa ga hanyar ƙwarai, sabõda haka mun yi ĩmãni da shi bã zã mu kõma bautã wa Ubangijinmu tãre da kõwa ba."

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَـٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَـٰحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
verses.english: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne shĩ girman Ubangijinmu, Ya ɗaukaka, bai riƙi mãta ba, kuma bai riƙi ɗã ba."

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًا
verses.english: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression.
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne shi, wãwanmu ya kasance yana faɗar abin da ya ƙetare haddi ga Allah."

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا
verses.english: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie.
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne mũ, mun yi zaton mutum da aljani bã zã su iya faɗar ƙarya ba ga Allah."

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
verses.english: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden.
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne shi wasu maza daga cikin mutãne, sun kasance sunã nẽman tsari da wasu maza daga cikin aljannu, sabõda haka suka ƙara musu girman kai."

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدًا
verses.english: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone [as a messenger].
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne sũ, sun yi zato, kamar yadda kuka yi zato, cewa Allah bã zai aiko kowa ba."

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَـٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
verses.english: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne mũ mun nẽmi (hawan) sama, sai muka, sãme ta an cika ta da tsaro mai tsanani da kuma yũlãye."

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ ٱلْـَٔانَ يَجِدْ لَهُۥ شِهَابًا رَّصَدًا
verses.english: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him.
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne mũ, mun kasance muna zama daga garẽta, a wurãren zama dõmin saurare. To wanda ya yi saurãre a yanzu, zai sãmi yũla, mai dãko dõminsa."

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
verses.english: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne mũ ba mu sani ba, shin, sharri ne aka yi nufi ga waɗanda ke cikin ƙasa, ko Ubangijinsu Yã yi nufin shiriya a gare su ne?"

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدًا
verses.english: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways.
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne mũ, akwai sãlaihai a cikinmu, kuma akwai a cikinmu waɗanda ba haka bã mun kasance ƙungiyõyi dabam-dabam."

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُۥ هَرَبًا
verses.english: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight.
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne mũ mun tabbatã bã zã mu buwãyi Allah ba, a cikin ƙasa, kuma bã zã mu buwãye Shi da gudu ba."

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
verses.english: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden.
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne mũ, a lõkacin da muka ji shiriya, mun yi ĩmãni da ita. To wanda ya yi ĩimãni da Uhangijinsa, bã zai ji tsõron nakkasa ba, kuma bã zai ji tsõron zãlunci ba."

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا۟ رَشَدًا
verses.english: And among us are Muslims [in submission to Allah], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course.
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne mũ akwai a cikinmu, waɗanda suka mĩƙa wuya, kuma akwai a cikinmu karkatattu. to, wanda ya mĩƙa wuya waɗancan kam sun nufi shiryuwa."

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
verses.english: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood.'
verses.hausa: "Kuma amma karkatattu sai suka kasance makãmashi ga Jahannama."

verses.arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَـٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًا
verses.english: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision
verses.hausa: "Kuma dã sun tsayu sõsai a kan hanya, dã lalle Mun shãyar da su ruwa mai yawa."

verses.arabic: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
verses.english: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment.
verses.hausa: "Domin Mu jarraba su a ciki, kuma wanda ya kau da kai daga tuna Ubangijinsa, Ubangijinsa zai shigar da shi azãba mai hauhawa."

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلْمَسَـٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدًا
verses.english: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone.
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne wurãren sujada na Allah ne, saboda haka kada ku kira kõwa tãre da Allah (da su, a cikinsu)."

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
verses.english: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass."
verses.hausa: "Kuma, lalle ne shi, a lõkacin da bãwan Allah ke kiran Sa sun yi kusa su zama kamar shirgi a kansa."

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
verses.english: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "lna kiran Ubangijina ne kawai, kuma bã zan tãra kowa da Shi ba."

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
verses.english: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Lalle ne, nĩ bã ni mallakar wata cũta gare ku, kuma bã ni mallakar wani alhẽri."

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّى لَن يُجِيرَنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا
verses.english: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Lalle ne, nĩ kõwa bã ya iya cẽtona daga Allah, kuma bã zan iya sãmun mafaka ba daga gare Shi."

verses.arabic: إِلَّا بَلَـٰغًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا
verses.english: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever.
verses.hausa: "Fãce iyarwa, daga Allah, da manzancinsa. To, wanda ya sãɓa wa Allah da ManzonSa, to, lalle yana da wutar Jahannama suna mãsu dawwama a cikinta, har abada."

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
verses.english: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number.
verses.hausa: Har idan sun ga abin da ake yi musu gargaɗi da shi, to, zã su san wanda ya zama mafi raunin mataimaki da mafi ƙarancin adadi.

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّىٓ أَمَدًا
verses.english: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Ban sani ba a kusa ne abin da ake yi muku gargaɗi da shi, ko Ubangijina Ya sanya maSa dõgon ajali!"

verses.arabic: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
verses.english: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone
verses.hausa: "Shi ɗai ne Masanin fake sabõda haka, bã Ya bayyana gaibinSa ga kowa."

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسْلُكُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ رَصَدًا
verses.english: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers
verses.hausa: "Fãce ga wanda Yã yarda da shi, wato wani manzo sa'an nan lalle ne, zai sanya gãdi a gaba gare shi da bãya gare shi."

verses.arabic: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا۟ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عَدَدًۢا
verses.english: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.
verses.hausa: "Dõmin Ya san lalle, sun iyar da sãƙonnin Ubangijinsu, kuma (Shi Ubangijin) Yã kẽwaye su da sani, kuma Yã lissafe dukan kõme da ƙididdiga."
